description:
TUNED UP FOR HIGH-PERFORMANCE
Feel the rush of the escape and the thrill of the takedown with precision controls, awesome HD-quality graphics, and an enhanced interface designed just of the bigger Multi-Touch screen. 

Outrun the law in supercars like the Pagani Zonda Cinque– or stop racers cold in high-speed police interceptors like the Lamborghini Reventón. Need for Speed Hot Pursuit for HP TOUCHPAD will blow you away! 

CHOOSE YOUR WEAPONS!
Experience pulse-pounding action as you make the escape – or make the bust! As the Cop, lay down the law with roadblocks and spike strips – or fry the Racer’s electrical system with an EMP lock! As the Racer, make the getaway with overdrive, jamming, and oil slicks! Either way you go, you’ll be ready to duel it out on the road.

RACE UP TO 20 REAL-WORLD PRODUCTION CARS, INCLUDING 15 COP VERSIONS
Operate high-performance police interceptors or feel the high energy of burning up the highway in totally tricked-out supercars. Use nitro and hand brakes. Pull off 180° spins. Grind, nudge, evade, and drift! The feel of the swipes when you kick in nitro or operate the handbrake has been specifically tuned to match the more responsive touch control of the HP TOUCHPAD. Accomplish extreme maneuvers and score bounty points!

PICK UP & PLAY AND CHASE CAREER ACHIEVEMENTS 
Pick up and play and get rolling in seconds, or take it to the limit in up to 24 Cop or Racer Career Events. Collect bounty and progress to the top of the ranks.

VISUALLY STUNNING AND BUILT FOR SPEED LIKE NO OTHER NFS GAME
Focus on the chase with the intense HD-quality graphic quality you get with the HP TOUCHPAD. Burn through coastal, desert, and mountain environments in night, day, and dusk scenarios. Experience epic takedowns and awesomely over-the-top crashes. You’ve never seen or felt anything quite like this!
